and it's been in online...

Selena Gomez, Taylor Swift,
- I'll be right back.

- It was like the keys...
- [Girl in Gray] Um,
I need to go to the bathroom.
You need to go to the bathroom?

It was nice talking to you.
- [Boy] Nice to meet you.

- Bye.
- We're gonna go the bathroom.

- [Waitress] Do you guys
wanna see a dessert menu?
- Keep making fun of me, cause I'm like...
- Aww, why would they make fun of you?

- [Girl] I thought it
was really good (laughs).

comments.text:
Me:
First face: I've never made it, cause I'm lesbian and it's considered 
creepy to look at a girl like that...
Second face: I have no opinion on fashion please don't ask me anything I'm 
the worst!
Third face: Yeah, cramps
Fourth face: I'm most likely talking to a girl...
Fifth face: You're strangling me AND I don't know you. But ya know, a hug's 
always good.
Sixth face: Please ask me first, I barely had any!
Seventh face: Oh come on, I didn't take all of it!
Eighth face: Lalalalala just take your time, I'll contemplate the meaning 
of life with all this spare time...
Ninth face: It's never happened before...
Tenth: Okay, it's my hair, just don't get it in a dreadlock! My hair is 
like a magnet, I can't stop people from playing with it.
Eleventh: Oh god if he's flirting with me I'll murder someone... how can I 
bring up my sexuality without seeming to draw the focus to myself! Um... 
Okay just play along how to bring up this please don't flirt goodness...
Okay, the flirting thing, I hug people and touch people on their shoulders 
all the time, as long as we're friends. If we're not friends, and you're a 
girl it's flirting.﻿
